entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43485 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #329

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILC should run after ComputeResolvedFilesToPublishList #108909
  • License metadata on windows runtime nuget packages is wrong #108905
  • CodeGen infrastructure work (.NET 10) #108904
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Productize JitOptRepeat #108902
    10.0.0
  • Improve JIT loop optimizations (.NET 10) #108901
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Improve inlining in .NET 10 #108900
    10.0.0
  • Suggestion: Support Member Functions and Static Functions in C# Enumerations #108897
  • Process.StandardOutput.ReadAsync read data super slowly #108894
  • System.Text.Json serializes both parent and child properties when using inheritance, even when new or override is used in the child class. #108890
  • Json deserialization of polymorphic types does not expose the discriminator value #108885
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 35 Regressions on 10/11/2024 8:14:13 PM #108892
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 9 Regressions on 10/10/2024 4:40:22 AM #108891
  • Authentication is failing for domain user while connecting winrm with Negotiate auth type from the Ubuntu Linux #108878
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 10/9/2024 1:12:38 AM #108893
  • JIT: Clean up `fgGlobalMorph` checks in morph #108875
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DI container should respect generic constraints when resolving single instance. #108874
  • Intel architecture improvements for .NET 10 #108869
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/ComWrappers/API/ComWrappersTests/ComWrappersTests.cmd #108868
  • `IHostBuilder.UseConsoleLifetime` equivalent when using `IHostApplicationBuilder` #108865
    Future

Closed

  • OpenSSL 3.x deprecated RC2 ciphers #106248
    10.0.0
  • Use Vector512 in BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness #108887
  • Streaming response bodies from an HttpClient in UWP in debug builds will hang on large messages. #108622
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'link' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #108600
    10.0.0
  • InvalidProgramException error message is unhelpful. #101321
    Future
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #108215
    10.0.0
  • CodeGen infrastructure work planned for .NET 9 #93141
    10.0.0
  • build error: comparison of different enumeration types #108827
    10.0.0
  • ReadECDsaPrivateKey_BrainpoolP160r1_Pfx test failure on windows #108815
    10.0.0
  • Removal of hasDebuggingEnabled function in 8.0.10 #108863
  • [Uri] Provide lossless roundtripping for Uri between platforms (Windows / Linux) #33029
  • [swift interop] Cannot call instance methods with at least one parameter when using `SwiftSelf<T>` #107946
    10.0.0
  • [Uri] Can't parse file:/ on Mac #26424
  • [HTTP/2] Change headers type in HPack tables from byte[] to string #31861
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(ssize_t)emitCurStackLvl >= argSize' #106140
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #106948
    10.0.0
  • Missing System.Net.ServerSentEvents 9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5 on NuGet feeds #108860

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable using -sign in VMR scenarios #108908
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure a null PublicKey is supported on assembly refs #108907
    area-VM-coreclr, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use loop-aware RPO for initial block layout #108903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Stable branding for GA #108899
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Fix up some documented exceptions #108896
    area-System.Collections
  • [mono][mini] Remove support for the Xamarin.iOS and Xamarin.Mac assemblies in the AOT compiler. #108886
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Bump serialize-javascript #108883
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Rename Net5CompatImpl to CompatImpl #108881
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • 2 accounting fixes #108880
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #108871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108870
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add security design docs for Dictionary, HashCode, and StringComparer #108864
    documentation, area-Meta

Merged

  • Remove logic around checking for and determining NGEN paths from dac-dbi interface #108853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move IsDebuggerPresent to minipal, convert to QCall #108837
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • unblock cloning of loops where the header is a try begin #108604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix CET debugger stepping over CALL instructions #108872
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Introduce a mechanism to disable CLR tests under SuperPMI collection #108873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Produce correctly typed IR in TLS helper expansion #108836
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Remove managed EH code frames from stack trace #108831
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make ExecutionManager.md markdownlint-clean #108866
    area-Meta
  • Fix compilation of Apple native shim on newer Clang #108888
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid `OverflowException` in `Boolean.TryFormat` #108572
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use default timeout of 30s. #108835
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108856
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108547
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix argument passing of structs with padding on x86 #108867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CET debugger stepping over CALL instructions #108809
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #108862
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.11
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #108861
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.36
  • Crossgen2 outer loop fixes #108819
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove static monitor helper functions #107667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Simplify making IL base JIT Helpers #108349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough checks in Compiler::TryLowerSwitchToBitTest #108106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Port NuGet Audit back to 9.0 #108854
    needs-area-label
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix folding of GC pointer arithmetic in lowering #108838
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108800
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2560938 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] testing #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] testing 4GB #108701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't call EnsureInstanceActive under StaticBoxInitLock #108736
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    area-Build-mono
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve error message for TypedHttpClient missing constructor parameter #108670
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Clean up in importervectorization.cpp #108818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed build error #108633
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] added basic function and tuple demangling #2718
  • Update async2 experiment from upstream #2717

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Documented binding PATs and alternative to vtables #2707
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Add tracking markdown. #2716
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

Updated

  • Update SystemTextJsonToolsetVersion (#108704) #2715

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable Publish_HostedApp_WithRidSpecifiedAsArgument_NoSelfContained_Works #44210
  • .NET 9.0 SDK is shipping unpatched copies of System.Text.Json #44197
    9.0.1xx
  • Enable NuGet Audit in sdk #44193
  • [WebToolsE2E] Install .NET SDK 9.0 RC2 +.NET SDK 9.0 RTM, the templates version is not replaced by higher versions. #44180
  • Publish_HostedApp_WithRidSpecifiedAsArgument_NoSelfContained_Works test fails #44179
    9.0.2xx
  • APICompat should compare relevant assembly-level attributes #44172

Closed

  • Customer using userlocal maui install unable to find maui workloads #44165

PullRequests

Created

  • stabilize branding for release #44211
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a -sign switch and enable signing for some legs #44207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve error message for missing artifact files #44206
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #44203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Workloads: Support VS component IDs #44198
    Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44195
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44178
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix "NETSDK1214" referring to existing diagnostic #44175
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2561325 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • msbuild patch to remove BuildXL feed #44199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove a extra item line #44084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection versions #43889
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Create 0001-remove-buildxl-feed.patch #44194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix SB assembly version test #44192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WASM and agent refactoring #43975
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.2xx
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Add xunit configuration to increase test logging #41963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fine tune first join point and VMR support for it #44153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-VMR
  • fix port error when fallback to http #44050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Compatibility through coexistence between extension types and extension methods #8496

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • F2 Rename on class only selects a part of the name #75521
  • Fix `Use auto property` does not update method arguments in property accessors #75516
    Backlog
  • Enable NuGet Audit in roslyn #75510

Closed

  • Implement nullable analysis for `field` keyword #75244
    17.13
  • Obsolete diagnostic not reported on System.Index or System.Range #57745
    Backlog
  • Aggregate telemetry for understanding analyzers/fixer perf to report on slow analyzers #67074
    17.6 P3
  • await completion adds async to unrelated local function instead of the containing method declaration #67952
    17.8 P4
  • List of Workspace/OOP/infrastructure simplifications we may be able to make within the Workspace #56763
    Backlog
  • `new str$$` completion shows two lowercase `string`, one as keyword and one as class name #63614
    Backlog
  • Source Generator - Visual representation of generated .g.cs files in Solution Explorer never updates #64162
    Backlog
  • Sticky scroll doesn't work in C# when Block Structure Guides are disabled #68310
    18.0
  • Intellisense not suggesting extension methods from source generated code #69887
  • Cross-project errors using reference assemblies #13815
    Backlog
  • API proposal: Expose functionality of `SyntaxGenerator.TypedConstantExpression` via a better method #62181
    Backlog
  • CodeFix/CodeRefactoring Support for AdditionalFiles and AnalyzerConfigFiles #62877
    Backlog
  • IDE0038 is not enforced during build #69052
    17.8 P4
  • Provide a knob for overridden members to keep showing in the editor's `override` menu. #69713
    Backlog
  • `dotnet_style_prefer_is_null_check_over_reference_equality_method` not respected by other features #65577
    18.0
  • Language Injection : Syntax highlighting and Intellisense support for languages or formats contained in string. #67182
    Backlog
  • IDE0055 should be better actionable #67594
    Backlog
  • Visual Basic Documentation Comments should minimize beside target, not above it. #67401
    Backlog
  • Revise `DeclarationModifiers.From` implementation #66171
  • 'Use primary constructor' should not be shown above 'Initialize field' #68671
    18.0
  • LanguageVersionExtensions needs to map special values to specific versions before comparing values #69477
  • Remove from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Features the deprecated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Elfie #67256
    18.0
  • FAR doesn't list all references from file linked into multiple project #66558
    18.0
  • How to extend embedded language highlighting utilizing StringSyntaxAttribute? #68435
    Backlog
  • C# document outline add region #65333
    Backlog
  • the rename variable utility renames more variable then needed #68464
    17.8 P4
  • Expose project ID on compilations in ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe #67218
    Backlog
  • Completions should not show `Obsolete` items with `error` set to `true` #67089
    17.8 P4
  • Embedded languages - support customizing tooltip #65531
    Backlog
  • Provide access to ApplicationDefinition project item from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project #67215
    Backlog
  • Pasting text in snipped closes the edit mode immediately #67572
    17.8 P4
  • Semantic code snippet can not loop Tab #67738
    17.8 P4
  • Incorrect Indentation after inserting prop or ctor semantic snippets (maybe others...) #67740
    17.8 P4
  • ctor code snippset doesn't work after 17.4.0 preview 5.0 update #68514
    17.8 P4
  • For loop auto completion, why not make settings to customize it's behavior? #60891
    18.0
  • Template formatting with namespace style leads to mis-aligned content #65591
    17.8
  • Introducing inefficiency: It seems the Add Reference dialog box pops up from the Roslyn "red light bulb" ... seems superfluous for all occasions. #65778
    Backlog
  • MissingMethodException in VS 17.6 RoslynCodeAnalysisService process when source generator loads another assembly #68290
    17.8 P4
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generator stops working after file rename #67125
    17.8 P4
  • Visual Studio IDE tool tips for method parameters do not display all parameters when there is a very large number as it overflows tool tip text limit. #75486
    Backlog
  • DebuggerDisplayAttribute #26054
    Backlog
  • Text editor project selection always resets in shared source files #41874
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify the compiler's policy towards well-known types/members #75522
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Fix keyword recommending in record parameter attributes #75520
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix 'use auto property' when field is passed as method argument #75519
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.12] EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated (#75423) #75518
    Area-Interactive, Blocked, untriaged
  • Also compare other properties when remove block spans #75515
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.12] Field-backed properties: [field:] should not be considered a backing field reference (#75461) #75513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove extra invalid character #75523
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Create nuspec for servicehub r2r symbol packages #75514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'await completion' adding async to the wrong member #75517
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unused option #75494
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated #75423
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Mention `Enumerable.Reverse` breaking change #75501
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types, Next
  • Report LSP loading telemetry #75402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • ExcludeFromSourceBuild->ExcludeFromSourceOnlyBuild #75504
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not crash server if we fail to determine language for non-mutating request #75509
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report obsolete diagnostics on `System.Index` and `System.Range` #75473
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75442
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75440
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [WIP] Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust IDE0290 code fix to keep comments before removed syntax node (#69012) #69518
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #75406
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Unify collection expression cycle handling #75464
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move `#if NET` directives forward #75500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add more first-class Span tests #75414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Cache checksum computation at an collection-element level #75479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Run binary SDL once on all artifacts #75502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Investigate speeding up InputFile #58447
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #58446
  • Enable arcade -sign functionality across aspnetcore's build #58445
  • Quarantine WebApplicationFactory #58442
  • Antiforgery validation failure returns 400 Bad Request for Controllers and 500 Internal Server Error for minimal APIs #58441
  • app.UseRequestLocalization overwritten on deployed IIS #58440
  • Enable NuGet Audit in aspnetcore #58437
  • OnAfterRenderAsync Not Triggered After Migrating to Blazor Web App with Server Interactive Render Mode in .NET 8 #58438
  • RequestId flashed across the page #58434
    Backlog

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #58436
  • Perf regression: fortunes #58435
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #58443
  • Component/partial static generation #58384
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_spring, plainTextSansFilter #58397
  • Perf regression: json #58405
  • Perf improvement: caching #58426

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flaky Http2WebSocket Kestrel test #58448
    area-networking

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Stabilize branding #58444
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Remove Winforms reference #58431
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Fix ModelMetadata for TryParse-parameters in ApiExplorer #58372
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0.0
  • Skip H2Spec 6.9.2/2 #58430
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Predicate<Claim>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Revert trimming test workarounds #58272
    area-infrastructure
  • Update global.json to 10.0 sdk #58425
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove bulk disables of CA warnings #58428
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS simulator does not launch #25301
  • CollectionView scrolling properties #25292
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `maui/release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #25290

  • Inconsistent HapticFeedback on iOS #25284
  • Images, loaded from stream, are not displayed in Release mode on Android using .NET 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.12 version #25283
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Issue with TouchBehavior Background Color Remaining After Navigation in .NET MAUI (iOS 18) #25280
  • Application.Current.Windows clears #25274
  • RadioButtonGroup/RadioButton throw CGContextSetLineWidth error on iOS 18.0/18.1. #25273

Closed

  • Rendering issue in WinUI when setting Label.FormattedText #24516
    Backlog
  • VisualState Setters not working properly on Windows for a CollectionView #22104
    Backlog
  • XAML Page Binding to Self Gets Incorrect Warning #25271
  • TemplatedView and TemplateBinding not working anymore in NET9 #24949
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • XAML Object Self Reference Gets Warning #25272
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Cant display an Entry : The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first #25277
  • Unable to run\Debug MAUI Application with net 8 #24868
  • NullReferenceException when setting BarBackgroundColor for a NavigationPage #25114
    .NET 8 SR10
  • clean suceeded, build failed #25261
    Backlog
  • Setting NavigationPage.HasNavigationBar="False" on modally presented NavigationPage causes top padding on iOS #24972
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update bug-report.yml with .NET 8 SR 9.2 #25305
  • Initialize ResourceDictionaryHelpers.SetAndLoadSource when XAML Hot Reload is enabled #25304
  • Update templates for non-VS IDE hosts #25303

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241015192031750 to net9.0 #25299

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [X] inherit DataType based on attribute #25296

    .NET 9.0 GA

  • Avoid bubbling up invalidation event on new layouts #25291

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [net9.0] Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25289
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25287
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #25286

    .NET 9.0 GA

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix for the issue with Label text color when resetting from FormattedText. #25119

  • [Windows] Fixed VisualState Update for CollectionView SelectedItem #25145
